text: The Lord spoke to Moses:
“Speak to the Israelites and tell them, ‘I am the Lord your God!

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> as they <st data-num="04639" class="">do</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st> you have been <st data-num="03427" class="">living</st>,<n id="1" /> and you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> as they <st data-num="04639" class="">do</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="03667" class="">Canaan</st> into <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> am about to <st data-num="0935 08033">bring</st> you;<n id="2" /> you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="01980" class="">walk</st> in their <st data-num="02708" class="">statutes</st>.
You must observe my regulations, and you must be sure to walk in my statutes. I am the Lord your God.
So you must keep my statutes and my regulations; anyone who does so will live by keeping them. I am the Lord.
“‘No man is to approach any close relative to have sexual relations with her. I am the Lord.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01540" class="">expose</st> your <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="06172" class="">nakedness</st> by <st data-num="01540 06172">having sexual relations</st> with your <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">She</st> is your <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st>; you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01540 06172">have sexual relations</st> with her.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> have <st data-num="06172 01540">sexual relations</st> with your <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>; <st data-num="01931" class="">she</st> is your <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="06172" class="">nakedness</st>.<n id="1" />

You must not have <st data-num="06172">sexual relations</st> with your <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st>, whether she is your <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> your <st data-num="0517" class="">mother’s</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st>,<n id="1" /> whether she is <st data-num="04138" class="">born</st> in the same <st data-num="01004" class="">household</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="04138" class="">born</st> <st data-num="02351" class="">outside</st> it;<n id="2" /> you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01540 06172">have sexual relations</st> with either of them.<n id="3" />

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01540" class="">expose</st> the <st data-num="06172" class="">nakedness</st> of your <st data-num="01121" class="">son’s</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> your <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter’s</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> by having <st data-num="06172">sexual relations</st> with them, <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> <st data-num="02007" class="">they</st> are your own <st data-num="06172" class="">nakedness</st>.<n id="1" />

You must not have <st data-num="06172">sexual relations</st> with the <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> of your <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st> <st data-num="04138" class="">born</st> of your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>; <st data-num="01931" class="">she</st> is your <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st>. You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01540 06172">have sexual relations</st> with her.<n id="1" />

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06172 01540">have sexual relations</st> with your <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st>; <st data-num="01931" class="">she</st> is your <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="07607" class="">flesh</st>.<n id="1" />

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> have <st data-num="06172 01540">sexual relations</st> with your <st data-num="0517" class="">mother’s</st> <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">she</st> is your <st data-num="0517" class="">mother’s</st> <st data-num="07607" class="">flesh</st>.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01540" class="">expose</st> the <st data-num="06172" class="">nakedness</st> of your <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st>; you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07126" class="">approach</st> his <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st> to have marital relations with her.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">She</st> is your <st data-num="01733" class="">aunt</st>.<n id="2" />

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06172 01540">have sexual relations</st> with your <st data-num="03618" class="">daughter-in-law</st>; <st data-num="01931" class="">she</st> is your <st data-num="01121" class="">son’s</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>. You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01540 06172">have sexual relations</st> with her.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06172 01540">have sexual relations</st> with your <st data-num="0251" class="">brother’s</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>; <st data-num="01931" class="">she</st> is your <st data-num="0251" class="">brother’s</st> <st data-num="06172" class="">nakedness</st>.<n id="1" />

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06172 01540">have sexual relations</st> with both a <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> and her <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st>; you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">take as wife</st> either her <st data-num="01121" class="">son’s</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> or her <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter’s</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> to <st data-num="01540 06172">have sexual relations</st> with them.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02007" class="">They</st> are <st data-num="07608" class="">closely related</st> to her<n id="2" />—<st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is <st data-num="02154" class="">lewdness</st>.<n id="3" />
You must not take a woman in marriage and then marry her sister as a rival wife while she is still alive, to have sexual relations with her.
“‘You must not approach a woman in her menstrual impurity to have sexual relations with her.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05414 07903 02233">have sexual relations</st><n id="1" /> with the <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st> of your <st data-num="05997" class="">fellow citizen</st> to <st data-num="02930" class="">become unclean</st> with her.
You must not give any of your children as an offering to Molech, so that you do not profane the name of your God. I am the Lord!

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07901" class="">have sexual relations</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> a <st data-num="02145" class="">male</st> as one <st data-num="04904" class="">has sexual relations</st> with a <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st>;<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is a <st data-num="08441" class="">detestable act</st>.<n id="2" />
You must not have sexual relations with any animal to become defiled with it, and a woman must not stand before an animal to have sexual relations with it; it is a perversion.
“‘Do not defile yourselves with any of these things, for the nations that I am about to drive out before you have been defiled with all these things.

Therefore<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> has <st data-num="02930" class="">become unclean</st>, and I have <st data-num="06485" class="">brought</st> the <st data-num="05771" class="">punishment for</st> its <st data-num="05771" class="">iniquity</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">upon</st> it,<n id="2" /> so that the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> has <st data-num="06958" class="">vomited out</st> its <st data-num="03427" class="">inhabitants</st>.

You <st data-num="0859" class="">yourselves</st> must <st data-num="08104" class="">obey</st><n id="1" /> my <st data-num="02708" class="">statutes</st> and my <st data-num="04941" class="">regulations</st> and must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> of <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="08441" class="">abominations</st>, both the <st data-num="0249" class="">native citizen</st> and the <st data-num="01481" class="">resident</st> <st data-num="01616" class="">foreigner</st><n id="2" /> in your <st data-num="08432" class="">midst,</st>

<st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> were in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> you have <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0411" class="">these</st> <st data-num="08441" class="">abominations</st>,<n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> has <st data-num="02930" class="">become unclean</st>.

So do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> make the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="06958" class="">vomit</st> you <st data-num="06958" class="">out</st> because you <st data-num="02930" class="">defile</st> it<n id="1" /> just <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> it has <st data-num="06958" class="">vomited out</st> the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> were <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> you.

<st data-num="03588">For if</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">does</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> of <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="08441" class="">abominations</st>, that <st data-num="05315" class="">person</st> who <st data-num="06213" class="">does</st> them will be <st data-num="03772" class="">cut off</st> from the <st data-num="07130" class="">midst</st> of the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>.<n id="1" />
You must obey my charge not to practice any of the abominable statutes that have been done before you, so that you do not defile yourselves by them. I am the Lord your God.’”
